textBeforeTable: There are templates defined for referencing variables, function, command, keys, manual etc. Use them for uniformity. See Category:Templates. Each template page should describe how to use that template. A few common examples: Templates Now you have a basic template which you can expand upon. Add content to the new page as you please. Save the newly created page. Click on the new Wiki link to create a blank page and paste the contents of clipboard there. Add this [[Test Page]] and save the scratch buffer. Goto WikEmacs:Scratch Buffer Visit Template:NewPage and copy the text area to clipboard. Feel free to modify the template. To create a new page, do this: Creating new pages Help with Mediawiki markup Mediawiki Help 5 Categories 4 Headline text 3 Templates 2 Creating new pages 1 Mediawiki Help Contents Code snippets are most welcome. But comment about what precisely the snippet does. Document any limitations as well. Note: this is not a QA site. Emacs questions are better answered at Stackoverflow
textAfterTable: Categories Special categories, such as Operating system, Emacs releases, Programming languages, should be used to introduce new categories. See Special:Categories.
